name: Bounty Haunter
description:
A ghost that wants revenge!  These phantoms were the reason this guy was made a ghost and now in the space between heaven and earth he will kill them all with his spinning gun.  If you get to close to the bottom -- you will die! If the ghosts get you, you will die.  If you don't keep flying, you will die.

We needed more time!  We have a good start, but its got a lot of bugs during gameplay.  We learned ALOT about game making during this time.

Debugging, creating menus, making a scene, using assets, UNITY UI, making health meters, destroying characters, adding buttons and lots more.  It was fun, but it was not easy :)
